channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Live: Wimbledon 2025
channel.desc: Live coverage of the final day at Wimbledon, including the finals of the men's singles and ladies' doubles. Each of the last two men's finals has ended with Serbia's Novak Djokovic losing to Spaniard Carlos Alcaraz. Djokovic, now 38, has won the title seven times, one short of Roger Federer's all-time record. Those three players, together with fellow greats Rafael Nadal and Andy Murray, have dominated Wimbledon finals this century.
